O.k. how about this I'll agree to start over from
scratch with my characters dineing they've interacted
with other chars under a few conditions.

1. My fixed backstory must be accepted.

2. Both the "Carnitrons" and the post about going back
in time must be accepted.

3. I get Omega Prime.  I already have a perfect
interdimensional backstory to get him here without
interfering with the story of "Transformers: Robots in
Disguise.

If you accept this it will be a big help to everone
even though you will be giving me 2 very powerful
chars who normally wouldn't exist in our dimension
since Omega is formed when Ultra Magnes and Optimus
Prime (not the original) fuse into one for those of
you who haven't seen "Transformers: Robots in
Disguise".

--- A Heap of Broken Images <thecode@...>
